page.name: Cards for a Cause
page.description: We are a community service club that hand-makes cards or other small gifts for local hospitals, senior living centers, nonprofit organizations, etc. Members may make cards at home and drop them off in B310 or sign up for Mrs. Cronin's connect session! This will also count for volunteer hours. Anyone can join at any time, and there are no mandatory meetings. You can contact us at mhscfac@masonohioschools.com
